main.name: Aditya Mulik

main.bio: I am a Software Developer based in Mumbai. I code as a passion & for career. Love building new products & have a knack for problem solving.

education.school: Atharva College of Engineering, affliated with Mumbai University
education.description: Majored in Information Technology focusing on Software Development & minor in Computer Networks having completed my undergraduate studies and received Bachelor's In Engineering (B.E.) Degree.

work.title: Python Programmer
work.description: Worked in an Data focused analytics based company as a Python Developer. Focused majorly on creating powerful interactive visuals using various Python & JavaScript Libraries for gaining meaningful insights. Created various Web Applications & automation scripts.

work.title: Associate
work.description: Worked in a Hedge Fund Company as a Linux Administrator, working majorly on creating various Python Programming Scripts for automating mundane monotonous tasks which usually required human intervention.
